record.dc:title: 48BN12 Eva, Benton County, Tennessee. Burials 6BN56 and 6BN57. Burial 56 at left in Square 54. Adult female(?) with head under left shoulder. Projectile point at left knee. Burial 57 at right. Adult male with head, face-up on right side. The burials intrusive from Stratum IV into Stratum V. Square 53 and 54CA. Direction NE.
record.wpa:narrative: [6BN56] Adult female in good condition, fully flexed on right side with head to west. Rather peculiar placement, excellent specimen. [6BN57] Adult male in good condition, fully flexed on right side with head to north. Peculiar and complete flexure.
